00218 #ifdef NEED_RAW_MODE
00219 
00220 #define uart_read(uart_num, buf, count) uart_read##uart_num(buf, count)
00221 #define uart_write(uart_num, buf, count) uart_write##uart_num(buf, count)
00222 uint8_t uart_read0(uint8_t *buf, uint8_t count);
00223 uint8_t uart_write0(uint8_t *buf, uint8_t count);
00224 uint8_t uart_read1(uint8_t *buf, uint8_t count);
00225 uint8_t uart_write1(uint8_t *buf, uint8_t count);
00226 
00227 #endif

00229 #if defined(USB_SERIAL)
00230 #define DEFAULT_BAUD_RATE B115200
00231 #elif defined(PLATFORM_MICA2) || defined(PLATFORM_MICAZ)
00232 #define DEFAULT_BAUD_RATE B57600
00233 #elif defined(PLATFORM_TELOSB)
00234 #define DEFAULT_BAUD_RATE 57600
00235 #elif defined(PLATFORM_MICA2DOT) || defined(PLATFORM_AVRDEV)
00236 #define DEFAULT_BAUD_RATE B38400
00237 #else
00238 #error "Undefined baud rate for this platform"
00239 #endif
